uta:field.uta:comment: time of automatic day close hhmm
Terminal Options 1: 0x04 (Tips enabled Option), 0x02 (Display Pan Option), 0x01 (MOTO Enabled option) are used
Terminal Options 2: bits 0x20 (Base Total Entry option), 0x02 (Printer Enabled Option) are used
Terminal Options 5: bits 0x80 (Display Name Option), 0x40 Confirm Amount Entry Option) are used
Local Options: bits 0x08 (ROC Search Password option), 0x04 (Refund Password Required Option), 0x02 (Void Password Required Option) are used
Connection Type: Dialup / TCPIP / GPRS / RS232 (to follow wifi)
TMS Connection NII, format length and value
Primary TMS Server Phone Number or IP address/port
Secondary TMS Server Phone Number or IP address/port
DF16 List of possible response codes
Service Code dari Entry Mode TMS
DF25 Amount found in the transaction file, in a previous transaction performed with the same card
Flag untuk dump iso message 0 - mati 1- nyala
Flag untuk Brizi Discount 1 - Rp 2- persen
Flag untuk dump iso message 0 - mati 1- nyala
Batch copy flag 2 - Belum dicopy ke batch, 1 - belum dicopy ke temporary, 0 - sudah selesai
last Trans index untuk reprint last
last Prepaid Trans index untuk reprint last
